channel.title: Need help with letting other people connect!
channel.description:
well i really need help, i ahve the server and client all set up and everything i portfowarded with Utorrent, have no-ip downloaded but idk like how to get other people to use it but im not sure? do i have to like get my ip setup with my source? id be more then willing to have someone Teamview me that would help alot please PM me, post here, or add my msn dakotabackman8@live.com thanks alot :D
o btw this is my first server ever so i dont know alot about servers the techy talk please coaoperate :D thanks

item.title: Need help with letting other people connect!
item.dc:creator: @Devastator Devastator
item.description:
@Devastator wrote:

I got it up for him. It was cake.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with letting other people connect!

item.title: Need help with letting other people connect!
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Go to your client files.

Find GUI.java

search for

sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName("

in between the " put your server ip.

Open up client.java
search for

server =

put your server ip there.

Save, compile.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with letting other people connect!
